ItemDesc: Upon use, immediately recovers 2 Technique Points for the team.
ItemBGDesc: A packet of cooked seeds made by utilizing the Vortex Theory. Eat a handful of them, and they'll launch themselves to the roof of your mouth like popping candy. Downside is, they'll stay there. It's recommended that you eat them while lying on your stomach. "People start all sorts of shenanigans when they're fed."
